item.title: An options trade that makes money from falling Treasury yields
item.description: Jeff Kilburg breaks down this trade on TLT.

item.title: This is not another Silicon Valley Bank: Traders bet these loan issues are not systemic
item.description: Thursday’s sell-off doesn’t have investors worried too much right now.

item.title: Oppenheimer upgrades Jefferies amid credit concern selloff, says First Brands exposure 'very limited'
item.description: Shares of Jefferies have plunged about 26% since First Brands filed for bankruptcy on Sept. 29.

item.title: Bank of America raises target for AMD, sees nearly 30% rally on new AI hardware platform launch
item.description: Bank of America analyst Vivek Arya's new price objective of $300 implies that shares of Advanced Micro Devices could rally 28% from here.

item.title: HSBC upgrades shares of Freeport-McMoRan on higher copper prices
item.description: HSBC sees shares of Freeport-McMoRan rising 20% from here.
